ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
The mission in Japan weakened reconnections between the members of DV8.
Nicole sleeps with Threshold thanks to her power and forces him to obey him.
Copycat feels alone and also tries to force Frostbite to sleep with her. This one resists and tries to reassure her.
Evo is attacked by deformed Gen-Active, but leaves him alive by pity.
Powerhaus is contacted by the spirit of a dead woman. He finds her body so that she rests in peace.
Sublimate, exhausted morally, tents to commit suicide, but her power prevents her from it and protects her in spite of her.
ComicInfo.Title: Tonight
